title: President Rajapaksa visits Sri Dalada Maligawa with Kandy district UPFA candidates
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix by: Chandana Perera) President Mahinda Rajapaksa paid homage to Sri Dalada Maligawa, the most sacred Temple of the Tooth during his visit to Kandy this morning on 19th March. Venerable Maha Sangha invoked blessings on President Rajapaksa after he engaged in religious observances at the Sri Dalada…
